prompt: A city plans to deploy universal face-recognition at scale in 6 months.
rationale: Governance and public trust will likely block or delay; risk outweighs speed.

prompt: A utility wants AI to advise grid operators; pilots will be human-in-the-loop.
rationale: Scoped, safe deployments build trust; measurable efficiency gains likely.

prompt: A holding company wants a ‘universal AI platform’ before any use-case wins.
rationale: Platforms need demand pull; build after real wins, not before.

prompt: A hospital wants analytics on bed flow with weekly operations meetings.
rationale: Fast insights with process ownership tend to land and stick.

prompt: A retailer wants ‘AI everywhere’ with one chatbot.
rationale: Generic assistants without integration rarely deliver ROI.

prompt: A port wants AI crane scheduling after sim validation.
rationale: Validated in simulation + clear KPIs → good candidate.
